name: Rugby Coach
overview: Rugby Coach is a Rugby sports game, developed by Masters Of Strategy and published by CDS, which was released in Europe in 1992. Rugby Coak is a 1-4 player rugby management simulation which features include: Rugby League 1st and 2nd division; Rugby Union 3 Divisions, 3 Cups, full yearly calendar. Full player names and editors and the international scene. Five Nations, Grand Slam Triple crown and much more.
